text: 08 Oct 2024 Set off on an adventure to new worlds this week! This selection of new science fiction and fantasy books will surely please! Science Fiction fans should be excited about the latest from bestselling authors Glynn Stewart, Sean Fenian, M.R. Forbes, and more. If Fantasy is what your library needs, you’ll be able to pick up the latest from E.P. Bali, Linsey Hall, Eva Chase, and more. Enjoy your new science fiction and fantasy books. Happy reading! html:
08 Oct 2024

Set off on an adventure to new worlds this week! This selection of new science fiction and fantasy books will surely please! Science Fiction fans should be excited about the latest from bestselling authors Glynn Stewart, Sean Fenian, M.R. Forbes, and more. If Fantasy is what your library needs, you’ll be able to pick up the latest from E.P. Bali, Linsey Hall, Eva Chase, and more. Enjoy your new science fiction and fantasy books. Happy reading!
